extendedInfo.description: Want to be a great Ninja? Check whether you can be a Ninja or not ?? try this awesome Game for FREE and know whether you or any of your friend can be a Ninja!!âAre you a Ninjaâ is a classic Ninja Tester app which will let you know whether you are a Ninja or not. As we all know Ninja(Nano Ninja, Ninja Dogs, Blade Rampage, Ninja Bolt) is a animated action hero who helps and protects from all the threat in many situations like darkness has descended upon the city, evil forces have invaded every sector of society. Check out whether you can be a Ninja who fights and saves people from all danger!To become an awesome ninja, you need to be quick, smart, learn your environment, and always know when to use items to increase your running ability. âAre you a Ninjaâ is a fun app which helps you find whether you can be Ninja or not. Try this most addictive ninja game in Android Market which includes perfect blend of colors like blue, green, yellow and shades of black & white. It's HD graphics and realistic nature scene like blue sky, eye pleasing greenery, jungle stones and many other gives a enchanting look.FEATURES:- Super addictive simple touch screen gameplay!- Super-sharp high resolution graphics.- Incredibly fun, just one more time, endless game play!- High contrast color scheme so that small screen devices with low resolutions can easily see what's on the screen.- Simple and easy to play.- No registration required, you can play right away! And it's free too!Enjoy this app and have loads of fun!The application has been tested extensively on various models of Samsung galaxy ace, Sony Xperia, HTC One V. The  application works perfect on all mobiles and gives you a thrilling experience on tablets. No Internet connectivity is required to play this game.One of the best fun game for your smart phone. Download this Android game and have sheer pleasure & ease experience!!We really hope you enjoy the game and share your achievements with your friends at facebook, twitter and google plus!If you are fond of action games like pirates, ninjas,zombies and pandas and want to be one of them, then check this out!!Tags: free android apps, Ninja Game, android game, ninja doodle, ninja run
